info.name: gosysutil API
info.description: API collection for gosysutil system metrics. All outputs are human-readable and sensible.

request.description: Returns a detailed breakdown of CPU usage percentages (Total, User, System, Idle). The metrics are calculated by sampling CPU activity over a 500ms interval to provide accurate real-time usage.
Returns a list of all physical disks (excluding loop/ram devices) with their cumulative read and write counts since the system started.

Returns memory usage statistics including Total, Used, and Free memory, plus Swap details. Values are formatted in human-readable units (e.g., GB, MB) and include a 'percent_used' field for quick assessment.
Returns traffic statistics (Received and Sent bytes) and packet counts for all network interfaces. Data sizes are automatically scaled to human-friendly units (KB, MB, GB).
Returns a list of all running processes with their PID, name, memory usage (RSS), and the command used to start them.
Returns a comprehensive snapshot of the entire system in a single JSON response, including refined CPU breakdown, memory summary, disk inventory, and network status.
